info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 18 at 4:22PM MDT until May 18 at 5:15PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: The National Weather Service in Albuquerque has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Harding County in northeastern New Mexico... Southeastern Union County in northeastern New Mexico... * Until 515 PM MDT. * At 422 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 11 miles northwest of Sedan, or 17 miles southwest of Clayton, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Amistad, Hayden and Sedan. This includes Highway 64 between Mile Markers 419 and 428. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Blowing dust associated with strong thunderstorm winds can reduce visibilities below one quarter mile at times.
